comment: Aleksandar Radosavljević, (born 25 April 1979 in Kranj) is a Slovenian football midfielder. Radosavljević was a member of the Slovenian national team.In August 2010, Radosavljević was signed by Dutch Eredivisie team ADO Den Haag. In Summer 2011 he signed a new contract until the end of 2012–13 season. After he was sent on loan to VVV-Venlo, he was released after the 2012–13 season.
name: Aleksandar Radosavljević
